channel.title: [Request]508[Request]
channel.description:
I've got 24 tasks to complete by 9 hours. Anyone want to give me a hand? please bear in mind source the source is 508. Tasks are below.
1.godwars 2. godwars drop ratio so that they drop their own gs and armor. 3 make bosses a little bit eaiser and make the drops more common. Like 1/10 4. 30mil starter xp 5. 15mil gp starter 6. red donator crown next to a donators name. 7. a max str command for mods. ( a secret code not like ::maxstr) 8. sellinventory command 9.castle wars. 10 staff zone in catherby. 11. ::staffzone command to tele to the staff zone 12. change the torso and firecape to cost 35 kills ea. 13. change addy gloves to 10 kills barrows to 20 14. friends list working. 15. a training spot 16.change damage xp rate to 800 xp per 1 damage 17. dfs and d claws dropped by kbd make it like a rare drop but not super hard to get like rs. 18.update dragon claw gfx. 19. reset def command. 20. raise ags spec accuracy 21. ::cwars to tele to castle wars. 22. take vesta long sword out of the game. 23. ::getpass command. 24. when you log in “”welcome to fresh 508”

item.title: [Request]508[Request]

I’ve got 24 tasks to complete by 9 hours. Anyone want to give me a hand? please bear in mind source the source is 508. Tasks are below.
